remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
ov.1 $e |- C e. _V $.
ov.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ov.3 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ov.4 $e |- ( z = C -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
ov.5 $e |- ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) -> E! z ph ) $.
ov.6 $e |- F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) /\ ph ) } $.
ov $p |- ( ( A e. R /\ B e. S ) -> ( ( A F B ) = C <-> th ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d th x y z $.
